tool_description: Check out our new Developer Portal and docs: https://www.flowcode.com/developer-portal
title: Flowcode

api_list.name: Create QR Code
api_list.description: This API takes an endpoint and return and image for a QR Code in either svg, png, jpg, or pdf format

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: This is the URL the QR code will scan to

parameters.name: imageType
parameters.description:
Response image type:
png, svg, pdf, or jpg

parameters.name: bgColor
parameters.description:
Hex background color for flowcode.
Format: #rrggbb or transparent for transparent background.

parameters.name: fgColor
parameters.description:
Hex foreground color for flowcode
Format: #rrggbb

parameters.name: rimTextTop
parameters.description: For style=rim, the call to action text to put at top of the rim

parameters.name: style
parameters.description:
Style of flowcode:
default, inset, or rim

parameters.name: moduleShape
parameters.description:
Shape to use for code pattern:
default, circle, square, or diamond

parameters.name: rimTextBottom
parameters.description: For style=rim, the call to action text to put at bottom of the rim

utterances.utterance: Generate a QR code for https://www.example.com in PNG format.
Create a QR code that links to https://www.shop.com with a transparent background in SVG format.
I need a QR code for https://www.blogsite.com in JPG format with a blue foreground.
Can you create a PDF QR code for https://www.news.com with a red background and default style?
Make a QR code for https://www.travel.com in SVG format with a circle pattern.
I want a QR code for https://www.music.com in PNG format with 'Listen Now' at the top of the rim.
Create a QR code for https://www.food.com in JPG format with a diamond pattern and green foreground.
Generate a QR code for https://www.fashion.com in PDF format with 'Shop Now' at the bottom of the rim.
I need a QR code for https://www.sports.com in SVG format with a square pattern and yellow background.
Make a QR code for https://www.education.com in PNG format with an inset style and purple foreground.
